original: Öhrvik, Knut Isidor, stationsinspektor, Skövde, f. 21/4/90 i Växjö, G. 1. 15 m. Gerda Carlson, d. 41; 2. 46 m. Magda Åhlén. Barn: Brita f. 16, fil. kand., korresp., Ingrid 19. — Stud. v. Växjö h. a. 1. t. 07. Res. t. Tyskl. 29. An,st. v. SJ 07, byråassist. i Ange 40-42, stat :insp. i Vislanda 42-46, i Skövde fr. 46. Medl. av Rotary. Hobby: fiske. GM.
translated: Öhrvik, Knut Isidor, station inspector, Skövde, b. 21/4/90 in Växjö. Married 1. in 1915 to Gerda Carlson, who passed away in 1941; 2. in 1946 to Magda Åhlén. Children: Brita, born in 1916, holds a Bachelor's degree, working as a correspondent; Ingrid, born in 1919. Studied at Växjö upper secondary school until 1907. Traveled to Germany in 1929. Employed by SJ (Swedish Railways) since 1907, working as an administrative assistant in Ange from 1940 to 1942, then as a state inspector in Vislanda from 1942 to 1946, and in Skövde from 1946 onwards. Member of Rotary. Hobby: fishing. Note: GM refers to the person being married.
